#futureofcities panel. When designing #city #Futures, how can we balance: 1. individual and societal needs and desires; 2. #technology capabilites and reliance; and 3. Cost of #environmentalsustainability?
#lse #futureimpactsummit https://t.co/yWPmbmSmqA

#citiesoftomorrow panel. Heard the oft quoted mantra that, globally, we are better off on pretty much every measure than in previous eras. Haven't checked the data - is this true across the entire #planet? #lse #futureimpactsummit https://t.co/XWLW3Qa0Do

I love how people on panels talking about the #futureofcities use the term 'let's be practical' to justify just talking about the present and current #trends and ignore any of the #disruptors and #shifts that could have a far greater impact. #lse #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/YuRKVqdFRx
#Careers of the #Future panel. Definity the most personal / company sales pitches and least new or #forwardlooking content 🤣🤣🤣 of any session so far #lse #futureimpactsummit

Can we enable a more globally #inclusive, #equitable, and #sustainable #future just by focusing on the #careerpaths and options of the largely #graduate  audience in the room #lse #futureimpactsummit https://t.co/WA2gvptHRV

Disappointing to see how the #careersofthefuture panel is largy taking a young #whitewestern educated view of who #employees are, their #values, #purpose, and  #careerchoices #missedopportunity #lse #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/BybEUICPGO

Conference so far has been predicated on asumption that the world is full of v. smart people of graduate level education or beyond. Interesting to see if this panel acknowledges the other  7 billon+ on the planet. #LSE #FUTUREIMPACTSUMMIT #FUTURE https://t.co/wi1wFSw1hj

Interesting to see how fast the gap is growing between the speed with which the applications of #AI are expanding and evolving and the level of #societal, #government, #corporate, and #regulator
https://t.co/Qf4NSjylD5

Given that most #crypto, #NFT, #Blockchain, #Web3, and #metaverse ventures start and fail almost as fast as the #UK changes #Primeministers, how can we build #masspublicunderstanding and #trust in this space and avoid blunt #regulation ? #LSE #FUTUREIMPACTSUMMIT #FuturePerfect https://t.co/YO6quJAHq1

@Iranwatkins #tokenizing #carbon allows true #verifiability, #timestamping, #auditability and #transparency of #carbonoffset programs, enables #farmers to earn from their #absorbativeasset and allows #builders to design it in for all developments #LSE #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/ip63GvHHSr
#Web3 affords value to #data by by assigning #trustless #propertyrights   and #Longevity using #decentalization and #Tokenization #LSE #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/ByAxdAtD2f
@florentstroppa of #Nodle taljing about their #swarmconputing sution delivered via #mobilephones - onecto look into #LSE #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/ALmXy1ITV6

Very very optimistic view of #AI in #society. For me it requires a real understaning of what thectechnology is and where it's going and the capcity to influence #business and #tech #investments in the field. #LSE #futureimpactsummit #future https://t.co/ZrrGPQBKqy

#johnzerilli argues that #elonmnusk takeover of #twitter is concerning as #benevilentdictatorships don't aren't beneficial for wider #publicbenefit - how does this square with places like #Dubai and #SaudiArabia pioneering  cutting edge #AI applications? #LSE #futureimpactsummit https://t.co/nNYbE0VvEv

Charming to hear the #AI panel suggesting a wonderfully utopian view that the mass of #humanity can shape the #futureofAI - requires #techfirms like #microsoft #google to tell us about what their #R&D plans are. Is that haplening?#LSE #futureimpactsummit #Future

Can't believe that soeakers are still saying that #AI won't take over jobs that have a significant #cognitive component. Simply not borne out with what's haplening with corporate and government AI investment plans. #LSE #futureimpactsummit #Future https://t.co/Cuh0Ond7mv
So looking forward to delivering jeynotes at the event #futureoftravel

#Malikamalike of #Google arvying that #AI won't take away #jobs because of the expansion of activity and possibities in fields such as #retail. Colour me dubious. #LSE #futureimpactsummit #Future https://t.co/eACs8sMt5D
Looking forward to hearing what the #nextgeneration of #leaders think about the #future and how we make it a place that welcomes all #humanity. #LSE #futureimpactsummit https://t.co/X5HqzmGG2n

@Uber_Support @UberEats How do I make a complaint - your entire sets of apps, website, and phone support are designed to drive me crazy

@Uber_Support #3/3 The process is madly frustrating. Support person gave a number to call for complaints but then said that was the order support number and they couldn't help. I should send a bill for my therapist because you have driven me crazy. #5E4F2

@Uber_Support #2/3 The support person kept telling me to follow help in eats app and it would show me how to contact you. There is no help tab available on the app I just downloaded and when I type help in the search bar it just shows an error code #5E4F2

@Uber_Support #1/3 I tried to contact you via the eats app, website, and the normal app. No way to send a message. Only way is to call Uber rides. Wasted over 20 minutes trying. Ammar support person kept telling me to use the app and wouldn't listen

@Uber_Support I am in a living hell. I followed the mail guidance but it did not allow me to apply the promo code as it said in the email - it just went straight to a confirmed order. The website, app, and order support person was also crap #5E4F2

#Smartcities #HCL view: use in India is driving economic growth, enabling a better quality of life, and surveillance solutions that support smart / safe cities, traffic enforcement, and #environment monitoring - greater acceptance of tracking tech than UK
#ConnectedBritain2021

#smartcities panel: Users are increasingly trusting operators to provide digital connectivity versus using public and on premises WiFi- driven by a sense of greater #security / #privacy #connectedbritain2021
#smartcities panel: Are about much more than #5G / #fibre connectivity - awareness, support, digital literacy all key @HuaweiUK #connecteddbritain2021
#smartcities panel: Getting the #data right is the backbone of viable and sustainable connectivity solutions @HuaweiUK  #connectedbritain2021

#smartcities panel: Regular research on, and easy access to, best practice case studies key to avoiding wasted effort at the local level and  accelerating roll out - need specific step by step guidance down to the level of what stakeholder meetings to have
